column4: Hi, anyone knows how configure RAID1 disks given that they have already been mirrored earlier under Windows 7 (and I do not want to erase one of these two)
Yes. No chance, to be exact.
It is not possible.
Really.
NOT possible.
There is NO way to use a software based mirror in linux AND in windows.
For creating a _linux_-based software RAID. NOT for creating a software raid that can be used by windows too.
You will have to format both disks, not only one...
And you will not be able to use that RAID1 from the other OS.
Well, face it, that how things work :)
